div.a: 26 Moments That Restored Our Faith In Humanity This Year

div.div: Sometimes you need a reminder that people can do wonderful things.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/W78DJM&via=Digg&text=26 Moments That Restored Our Faith In Humanity This Year

div.a: A History Of Ads Looking For Weapons Designers

div.div: They were advertisements that said — in fairly blunt language — that you’d be happier if you were making weapons of mass destruction. There’s something particularly American about that.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VGkTut&via=Digg&text=A History Of Ads Looking For Weapons Designers

div.a: 12 Letters That Didn’t Make The Alphabet

div.div: There are quite a few letters we tossed aside as our language grew, and you probably never even knew they existed.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TRqJJH&via=Digg&text=12 Letters That Didn’t Make The Alphabet

div.a: Google Maps Vs. Apple Maps: What Each Can't Find

div.div: For all of Google's progress, it's not the last stop in mobile mapping. The ways each program dealt with a few Washington-area itineraries showed that both have things to learn.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Zv3Pyz&via=Digg&text=Google Maps Vs. Apple Maps: What Each Can't Find

div.a: 'Winter Vomiting Disease' Unleashes Its Misery Early, At Home And At Sea

div.div: It may be known as the ‘winter vomiting disease,’ but norovirus has already attacked schools, cruise ships, and elsewhere.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TZW2Vn&via=Digg&text='Winter Vomiting Disease' Unleashes Its Misery Early, At Home And At Sea

div.div: ALSO RUNS ADS FOR BIG BOOSTS

div.a: Google Tweaks Algorithm, Porn-Only Search.xxx Sees 50% Boost In Traffic

div.div: Google tweaked its SafeSearch setting and images search algorithm, significantly altering its search results: previously explicit searches have stopped returning explicit results.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Sq3FXe&via=Digg&text=Google Tweaks Algorithm, Porn-Only Search.xxx Sees 50% Boost In Traffic

div.a: The Three Must-Read Tweets On The School Massacre Were All Written Before A Single Shot Was Fired

div.div: Could it be that the best commentary on this moment in American history are actually the tweets from before the carnage even began? Here’s a look at three tweets that suddenly mean so much more.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WeCg85&via=Digg&text=The Three Must-Read Tweets On The School Massacre Were All Written Before A Single Shot Was Fired

div.a: Mob Blames 'Mass Effect' For School Shooting, Is Embarrassingly Wrong

div.div: Video games have long been a scapegoat for this type of violence. So when a mob of angry Facebook users noticed that Ryan Lanza had liked "Mass Effect" on Facebook the pile-on began.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U03jVc&via=Digg&text=Mob Blames 'Mass Effect' For School Shooting, Is Embarrassingly Wrong

div.a: Interactive Map: The U.S. Shooting Epidemic

div.div: The Brady Campaign to Prevent Gun Violence, a nonprofit lobbying group, has compiled a list of 431 shootings with more than one victim since 2005. Roll over or tap this interactive map to see how your state compares.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/MFv1lw&via=Digg&text=Interactive Map: The U.S. Shooting Epidemic

div.a: Microsoft's Secret Weapon In Its Battle Against Google

div.div: Mark Penn made a name for himself in Washington by bulldozing enemies of the Clintons. Now he spends his days trying to do the same to Google, on behalf of its archrival Microsoft.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U0bMI5&via=Digg&text=Microsoft's Secret Weapon In Its Battle Against Google

div.div: So you did it. Or maybe you did it again. Dropped your favorite gadget in a sink or a toilet. Or you spilled an entire 40oz on it. Oops. That doesn't mean you can't save it though. Here are a few tips that might just bring it back to life.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Y5mXml&via=Digg&text=How To Rescue Wet Gadgets

div.a: 'Black People Toothpaste' And China's Race Problem

div.div: "Black People Toothpaste," is one of the most popular toothpaste brands in China whose logo features a minstrel singer wearing a top hat, backed by a white halo and flashing a smile of blindingly white teeth.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Sqml97&via=Digg&text='Black People Toothpaste' And China's Race Problem

div.div: DOG HOUSE SOFA: THE NEW TICKLE-ME-ELMO

div.a: A Gifting Guide For Weird And Wonderful Humans

div.div: The best gifts are often things that people wouldn’t get for themselves, because they’re too luxurious, too weird, too whimsical, too fun, too boring, too impractical or too practical.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UIr8wW&via=Digg&text=A Gifting Guide For Weird And Wonderful Humans

div.a: How To Completely Bypass The Twitter Character Limit

div.div: Sometimes, you want to say something that exceeds Twitter’s 140 character limit.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VHACK0&via=Digg&text=How To Completely Bypass The Twitter Character Limit

div.div: Bucks Burnett is the eight-track’s most vocal champion, amassing an incredible collection of Stereo 8 cartridges, and opening the world’s first museum devoted entirely to the format.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Su4Chc&via=Digg&text=God Save The Eight-Track

div.a: Researchers Propose Wood For Bone Replacement

div.div: An international team of researchers looking for materials that could one day be used to replace bone in grafts and implants have started simple, suggesting that several types of wood could have the qualities doctors look for in a biocompatible bone replacement.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WbvoZj&via=Digg&text=Researchers Propose Wood For Bone Replacement

div.a: Brewers Prepare Beer For The End Of Time, Mayan Or Otherwise

div.div: The world isn't going to end next Friday, but Dec. 21, 2012, has come to be known as the Mayan apocalypse because that's when the Mayan calendar ends. Despite this, breweries around the country have decided to celebrate with — what else? — beer.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VGIGug&via=Digg&text=Brewers Prepare Beer For The End Of Time, Mayan Or Otherwise

div.div: WE NEED THAT BALROG WINGS RECIPE

div.a: J.R.R. Tolkien Cookbook Featured On Kickstarter

div.div: Heath Dill wants to share his recipes for second breakfast with his project, "Medium Rare and Back Again: A Tolkien Cookbook."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UCXnxI&via=Digg&text=J.R.R. Tolkien Cookbook Featured On Kickstarter

div.div: The word “disrupt” used to mean something you did in class, and in doing so you got sent home with a note featuring the word in red ink. Now the tech world has co-opted the word and is using it in all the wrong ways.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Zq7zRM&via=Digg&text=The Most Misused Word Of 2012

div.div: He carried a black briefcase to his honors English class, and sat near the door so he could readily slip in and out. When called upon, he was intelligent, but nervous and fidgety, spitting his words out, as if having to speak up were painful.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UH0Mhh&via=Digg&text=Who Was Adam Lanza

div.div: HONESTLY, YOUR JAM ISN'T THAT GOOD

div.a: Think Twice Before Quitting Your Job To Sell Homemade Jam

div.div: The false promise of the stay-at-home mom who makes money from her crafts.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UYcfLJ&via=Digg&text=Think Twice Before Quitting Your Job To Sell Homemade Jam

div.div: How Japan's murky underworld became the patron and power broker of the ruling party that intended to clean up politics.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VGmEYu&via=Digg&text=How Gangsters Run Japanese Politics

div.a: What Were The Last Words Spoken On The Moon?

div.div: Forty years ago, humans left the moon for the last time. But how did the three men who made that departure -- taking their last small steps, their last great leaps from the lunar surface -- mark that occasion?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U0JxZO&via=Digg&text=What Were The Last Words Spoken On The Moon?

div.a: Why Was The My Little Pony Fan Game Shut Down?

div.div: Bronies are a rather passionate adult fanbase for My Little Pony and they love to create stuff to express their fandom. But Hasbro hasn't completely come over to the light side of the force, having recently shut down a fan-made MLP game.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UssxsD&via=Digg&text=Why Was The My Little Pony Fan Game Shut Down?
